price: "A mi, doista, ne vjerujemo u to u što vi vjerujete", rekoše oni koji su bili oholi.
arabic: قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُوٓاْ إِنَّا بِٱلَّذِيٓ ءَامَنتُم بِهِۦ كَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla alladhīna is'takbarū innā bi-alladhī āmantum bihi kāfirūna
